timeline.bodyText:
Under which circumstances would either of these be null?
You can use java.util.Objects.equals BTW.
timeline.author: jglick

replies.bodyText: I think there can be a race condition between Reaper and KubernetesLauncher. In particular, namespace is not set immediately when KubernetesSlave is created. And i've definitely seen occurrences of the NPE when launching a lot of agents concurrently.
replies.author: Vlatombe
